choices: "Do a systematic inventory check on my assets"
1.content:
You hop out of the taxi in front of the massive sprawling estate, and your jaw drops:
This place has everything! A pool, a huge garden, and the estate itself is huuuuuuge.
You compose yourself and ring the bell. At your small stature, it was kinda hard to reach, but you managed by standing on your tip toes.
A mature womanly voice replies, "Yes?"
"Euhh, hello Ma'am, I'm Johnathan, your new financial adviser..", you stutter out.
"Aaahh yes, well come in!", she responds, with excitement in her voice.
The gate opens, and you enter.

You're looking around, it's a gorgeous garden, all kinds of flowers, resting on a bed of extra green lawn, if such a thing exists!

And there she was.

At the top of the stairs, you saw her, a tan beautiful blond amazon, who couldn't be more than 50 years old, standing like a goddess.
She was wearing a white strappy tank top, some white silky 3/4 pants, and some black platform flip flops, who helped accentuate her tallness.

You gulped and walked on, already intimidated by her, but her smile reassured you a bit.
She didn't move, instead she just waited for you to come to her, which made you accelerate your tiny steps, which in turn made her giggle a bit at your tiny form.

You finally arrived before her, after climbing the 20 or so stairs, and as you were looking down, you saw her toenails, perfect, and painted white, but you also noticed her feet were pretty big, thick too! They looked like they could stomp some bricks down to nothing but powder.

You shook your head to get you out of that trance, and you cleared your throat, and said in the best voice you could:
"..."
Your mouth stood agape, without a sound leaving it. As you were focused on her feet and on the ground, you didn't notice how colossal she was up close!
You stood barely at her breasts level, each as big as your head. Everything about this woman was big, but very proportionate.
She was very toned, with strong arms, and even stronger legs, who were stretching the silky pants to their limits..

As she noticed your surprise, she said with a booming sultry voice: "Hello little guy! You're quite smaller than I imagined."
She said, while patting your head. You felt even smaller then.
"Uhh hello Ma'am, or should I call you Jasmine?", you said grinning, trying to gain something back.
"No, that's Miss Jasmine for you!!" , she said, kinda annoyed with you.
"Yes Miss Jasmine, as you wish" , you turned red.
She held out her hand, and as you went to grab it, you noticed how big it was.
You gripped it and tried to shake it, but it didn't budge.
Instead, Jasmine ordered you to kiss it, and you obliged submissively.
"Come, let me show you where you will be staying", she turned on her heel, and started walking, taking huge strides which you had to walk comically fast to keep up with.

Your attention went back to her feet: They were perfect! Tan, big , strong, and smooth as silk, and the pedicure was impeccable as well.
As you were admiring them, you noticed a big beetle was right on the collision path with those huge soles!
You were about to say something to her, when:

SPLAT!

The beetle was crushed like it was nothing. When the sole lifted, the beetle was as thin as paper, with some parts stuck to the sole.
"Oops, sorry little guy! Haha! But can't lie, always fun to squish things under my feet, makes me feel powerful, the lowest part of me ended another thing's life!", she stomped back down and ground her feet even more, sealing the beetle in the ground.
"Hope I'm not scaring you too much, my other little guy, haha!", she said, as she wiped her feet on the floor, leaving a red smudge and the flattened carcass of the beetle.
"Hehe no , no worries".
You lied, you were scared, but also attracted more and more to her.

She finished the tour of the place, and left you to unpack.
All in all, this place had a pool, a home gym, a home theater, and a private tennis court. Like Damn SON!

Afterwards, you joined her in the living room, she had taken off her flip flops, and propped her feet up on an ottoman, and as you looked closer, you saw her feet were on a magazine, with a celebrity's face on it! Which made it so much more metaphorical for you.

You were shaken back to reality by her loud voice:"Johnathan, rub my shoulders as I tell you what exactly is your job here"
You obliged, feeling kinda weird, but meh it wasn't anything too crazy, so you started rubbing her big muscled shoulders as she started telling you what your job entails:
"So as you know, my husband left me a lot of money in businesses, stocks and this estate among 2 others, and I never was good academically, unless you count stomping on the nerds' glasses academic, haha!
So anyway, you will be managing these assets, making sure to grow them as much as you can, and being the youngest winner ever of the country's "Apprentice" contest, you sure won't find that too hard!"
"Wow, thank you for your trust Jas-I mean miss Jasmine!"
"You earned it. But, you also need to understand, that this house is big, and I do need someone to help me with the everyday chores, and take care of me, so you'll be responsible for that as well. Of course, you will be rewarded handsomely"
You pause for a minute. This is a dream job for any person, let alone the first job that you ever get, but the added fact that you will help her with chores made it a little fishy. But then again, you know for a fact you'll regret it for ever if you don't take this job, so it was a short self introspection.
"I'm on board, Miss Jasmine!"
"Great to hear! Now sign these papers here, with the initials here, here and here."
You didn't waste your time to read these, you just saw the big number on the front and that was all that it took for you to sign.
"Awesome! Now that you are officially my employee, I want to be called your queen, it has a better ring.
- S-sure, ... my queen
- It sounds even better than I thought! Now for your first task:"
1.title: Arrival

11.content:
She pointed you to the PC that was conveniently in the corner of the living room, and off you went.

You sat down, and your head was barely above the desk. You tried to raise the chair, but that was as high as it went, so you just had to make do.
It was a funny site, you sitting in that oversized chair, and your shoulders and arms raised and struggling to type, but man you were working fast. You were born to do this, and especially with the hefty sum of money that you're paid, you were extra motivated to do good.

Jasmine cam up behind you, and asked you a trivial question about what you were doing, almost too trivial.
You though she was joking and testing you, so you just laughed and continued working.
"Oh, so you're making fun of me now?
- N-no miss-QUEEN, sorry my queen.
- I see. You think just because you went to college and graduated top of the class, that you can laugh at me. Well I want to learn, so I'll just see what you're doing."
With that, she turned the chair around with ease, and plopped down on your lap, almost crushing your legs. She turned the chair back around to face the monitor, and relaxed, her back was now smushing the side of your face, and your head was squished into the back of the chair.
" WELL GET TO WORK, I'M NOT PAYING YOU TO LOUNGE AROUND!
- I'm sHOrry, my queen" barely able to make a sound.
"I can't sSHee the sSHcreen!" you wimpered, so she got off, and slapped you in the face, hard.
Your cheek was burning, but she demanded: "Kiss my hand, the hand that just slapped you"
You meekly kissed it, feeling your self worth getting lower and lower.
" And never make fun of me again!", she grabbed your glasses, and put them on the floor.
" Beg me not to crush them.
- Please my queen don't step on my glasses! I can't see anything without them!
- Not good enough" she put her flip flopped foot on them, but didn't step down.
" Get down on your knees, and try again."
You went down quickly, and got on your knees, you head now barely reaching the top of her thigh, and begged again.
" Kiss. My. Foot.", she commanded sternly.
You were running out of options, but you didn't want to kiss her foot, as it would mean ultimate submission.
Do you do it?
11.title: "Do a systematic inventory check on my asse...

choices: She crushes them, and laugh at you
111.content:
You bent your head down, and kissed her foot.
It tasted actually very good, lavender and slightly sweaty, but the act itself humiliated you.
There you were, top of the class, a veritable genius, and you were made to kiss the foot of person who didn't know anything, but who just happened to have money, so she was above you.
Oh and a much bigger body.

After kissing her foot, you crane your neck up and look at her face.
She had a big grin.
Was she satisfied, or does she crush your glasses anyway?
111.title: Give in, kiss her foot

choices: She goes to her home gym.
1111.content:
She laughed as she stepped down with her weight, and you saw your glasses getting pulverized.
But the humiliation didn't stop there.

"Kiss my foot again, and thank me for crushing your glasses."
This was too much. She was asking you to humiliate yourself in front of her feet, and thank her for damaging you!?
But, if you wished to keep this dream job turned nightmare, you had to do it.

So you bend your head all the way down, and kiss the foot that just crushed your glasses, and said:
"Thank you, my queen.
- For what?
- F-...for crushing my glasses.
- HAHAHA, you're welcome, pipsqueak.", she said as she ruffled your hair like you were a little boy.
" Now get back to work, and never step out of line again. I am the queen here, practically a goddess of this house, and you will respect me as such. I can do no wrong, you understand? If I spit in your face, you thank me, if I fart in your face, you thank me, if I hurt you, you thank me, got it?
- Y-yes, g-got it my queen." You said looking down at the ground. You just got every droplet of self worth literally crushed out of you under this woman's feet, and you had to thank her for every abuse she does to you.
The only thing keeping you doing this, is the though of your sick mother, and how this money could help her get the operation she desperately needs, to be healthy again. You didn't want her to die, you were barely 21 years old, and want to see her at your wedding, want to see her holding your kids, so you had to persevere now, and do whatever it takes to keep this job.

"Good, so we understand each other. For your sight issues, just get close to the monitor, and for the high chair, I have a fix for that right now."

She picked up the monitor and the PC tower with ease, and you held the mouse and keyboard, and she put them on the coffee table in front of the ottoman. You set up everything, and she removed the ottoman that she had her feet on, and told you to sit there, and work.

It was kinda silly, as you had to sit on the floor in front of the couch, but still, everything was in reach and you started working double time, to appease your queen, as she went to use the bathroom.

When she came back, she sat right behind you on the couch.

Suddenly, you feel a massive weight on each side of your shoulders.
Her heavy calves were pinning you down to the ground, as her feet were on each side of your head, but slighly in front.

" Is there a problem, pipsqueak?
- No my queen."
She nudges your head hard with one of her calves, and you remember.
" Thank you my queen, for using me as your foot stool.
- That's better."
She reclines back, and you try to continue to work.
Your view is now obfuscated by two very large and beautiful feet, so you have to constantly move your head around to see the different numbers on the screen, and your back starts to hurt, from holding all this weight, but you think of your sick mother, and you soldier on.

As you continue to work, she moves her feet around:
She put both feet flat on the back of your head, she puts her heels on top, she even puts her foot on your hand that's moving the mouse, and you now have to double your efforts just to be able to move, from how heavy she is.
1111.title: She crushes them, and laughs at you

11111.content:
You hear her order food from her phone:
A large steak, some mashed potatoes, a big chicken ceasar salad, a large drink, and some tiramisu.
You were excited, as you love these meals! Ok she was mean to you, but still, you were getting some good food!

So you got even more excited and worked harder, all the while she was rubbing her feet on your hair, like she was wiping them on a doormat.

Some time later, the gate bell rings. She gets up, ruffles your hair a bit, and asks you to put her flip flops on.
You slip her big feet in the flip flops, and as she heads to the door, she steps on your head like you were nothing but an insect.
Thankfully, she didn't step all the way, and you only got hurt a bit, and you were quick to thank her for it, which made her smile in return.
Ok you were getting the hang of it. Just hold on until you have enough money for your mom's operation, and you can be free from this. And if you were gonna be eating like this everyday, then that sure makes things easier!

She comes back with the food, and calls you to the dining table.
You pulled out a seat for her.
" Why thank you, little gentleman!"
You were proud of yourself, you took initiative and it paid off.
As you were taking a seat, Jasmine beckons:
"Ah ah ah! You don't get to eat yet.
You will be my butler for my lunch. I will tell you when to eat."
You were kinda disappointed, but meh, no worries, she says you will get to eat later, no there isn't an issue.

During her lunch, she asks you to rub her feet. So you get under the table, and you take off her big flip flops, and start rubbing.
Her free foot comes up and rests on top of your head, as to remind you of your status in this household.
You repeat the process with her other foot.
Once she's done eating, she pushes your head down to the ground, and steps out of the table. You take that as your queue to get up.
To your horror, you saw the plates all cleaned out. Not a single morsel left!
"Clean up the tabl- EEUUUUHHH", she lets out a huge belch.
"FRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT" followed by an even bigger fart, worst part is, you were standing right behind her, so it hit you right in your face, and blew out your hair.
"Thank you, my queen", you immediately remember to say.
"HAHAHA, so pathetic."
She fills her mouth with saliva, and spits in your face, and again you can only say:
"Thank you my queen." Your tears hidden under her big ball of spit.
"Here let me wipe that for you." She grabs your hear, and smushes it against her right ass cheek, and rubs you up and down.
Your feet were actually leaving the ground!
After some more rubs, and a thanks from you, she let's you go, and you go ahead and clean up the table.

You were worried about what the near future holds.
11111.title: "Time for lunch"

choices: She then calls you into your room.
She then invites some friends over.
111111.content:
"Woooh, all this food made me wanna let off some steam! Let's go shrimp"

You followed her, not knowing where you guys were going. She was farting on the long way there, and you had to take them to the face, and thank her for it.

Once she arrived, you understood that she wanted to work out, so she takes her flip flops, her tank top and her silky white pants off, and stays only in a bra and some panties.
But oh God what a body.

Her Arms were toned like crazy, her boobs magnificent as ever, her ass and thighs are even bigger than Chun li's!

She led you first to the bench press. She put some weights that were more than your twice your own body weight, and she started pumping.
1,2,....up to 12 reps! And she was just getting started!
She then added even more weight, and as she was getting ready to lay down again, she had a "fun" idea.

"Hey pipsqueak, lick the bench from my sweat."

You were shocked! You didn't want to do that, but if you wanted to keep your job, you had to.
You knelt down, and started from the top, to bottom.
Her sweat tasted like she was freshly showered, but her ass print sweat tasted a bit weird.
She laid back down, and pumped some more reps.
Then she got up, and grabbed by the neck and waistband, and wiped the bench with your face and hair!
"You took too long last time.
- Yes sorry my queen, thank you.
- You're welcome!" she says with a grin.
She then puts on even more weight, and busts out the last set like it was nothing.

You were made to lick the bench while she grabbed water.

She came back, and then led you to the squat rack.

"Ok pipsqueak, you're gonna let me know if I'm going deep enough. Stand behind me right here, and go down on your knees.
- Yes my queen"
She then proceeded to put also a ridiculous amount of weights on the barbell, and she squatted down till her ass touched your face, and continued down till her ass brought you down with it, hurting your neck, bad.

She did 3 sets this way, and then continued on to the leg press machine. It was no more a question of how she got these thighs.

"Let's make this fun!"
She sat down, told you to come near, then she put her feet on your chest and lifted you to the metal plate, then proceeded to perform the set this way, crushing the air out of your lungs all the way through the first set.
As she finished this first set, her feet let go of you, and you crumpled to the ground, and she followed that up with a trumpeting fart right in your air deprived face.

You looked down at your white shirt, and saw 2 huge foot prints right where her feet were, then looked up at her and saw her smiling, so you just thanked her for wiping her feet on your shirt.

The next set, she switched it up, as she sat on your face while doing the leg press, and you were sure you were gonna die like this, your head crushed like a grape under her gigantic ass.
But you survived, after many farts to the face, and thanked her again.

After finishing a couple more workouts, she sat down on the bench, drinking water, then she lifted her arms up, and told you:
"Lick my armpits clean, pipsqueak."
You had to oblige. You moved closer to her, and noticed that you didn't even have to bend down, as while sitting, you were at the perfect height for your head to reach her armpits. You like and licked for what felt like forever, and the sweat just kept on pouring.

After a while, she got bored and told you to switch arms, so you did, after thanking her.
Once she felt the other arm was sufficiently licked, she stood up, and led you back to the gym's entrance, where she told you:
"Lie down here, I wanna wipe my feet on you.
- Euh, yes my queen, thank you."
She spit on your face for no reason other than to humiliate you, and then she put her right foot on your face, and smeared it all over. Your face was now turned brown with the dirt on her feet and the spit making it stick.
Next, she put her right foot down on the ground, and then wiped her left foot on your stomach, back and forth.

You stood up, and saw yourself in the mirror, your whole upper body and your face were now dirty brown.
You turned to her, and said: "Thank you my queen, for using my worthless face as your doormat for your divine feet."
She started laughing hysterically, calling you pathetic, worthless and insect.
You were broken, just broken.
If it weren't for your mother, you would have quit before any of this could happen, but alas.

"Pipsqueak, here's your lunch."
She reached into her panties down her ass, and pulled out what could be described as a soggy tissue.
Only, it wasn't.
It was a piece of square white bread, that was mangled by her ass and sweat and farts, and now she wants you to eat it!
"What, no thanks?
- Euh, of course thank you my queen.
- Good boy."
With that she drops the piece of bread on the floor, spits on it, and then grinds her foot in it, and keeps it there, and orders you to eat.
You kneel down, and she puts her other foot on your head, as you try to work your tongue under her foot and get the sandwich.

Suddenly, you feel a sharp pain in your head, and then in your back.
She walked off, stepping on you like a rug, and you were left to complete your lunch.
She called to you from the kitchen, and you ran there.
She had put a bowl on the ground, and poured some water in it, and she was mixing it with her foot, as she ordered you to drink.
You thanked her for it, and started lapping away at it, as you were quite thirsty. The water tasted of sweat, feet and dirt.
111111.title: "Time for a nice workout"

1111111.content:
As you finished the little water she poured you, you heard her calling from what she designated as your room, when she first gave you the tour.

"Johnathan, come here. Oh and lick my foot prints on the way, haha!
- Yes, my queen."
You crawled on all fours, and licked each sweaty foot print her big feet left on the ground, until you reached your room.
You saw her standing with her chin high in the air, hands on her hips, and under her feet... your pillow.

She started marching in place, flattening the pillow and making it dirty.

She looked you in the eye all the while doing so, and you didn't dare look away, instead, you tried to force a smile on your face.

After she was done, and your pillow was only 2 inches thick, she reached into your bag, and grabbed:
1111111.title: She then calls you into your room.

choices: She makes you seduce your Mommy and vidoe tape it for her.
11111111.content:
She pulled out a picture of your mother and studied it … " Pretty … do you love your mommy ? "

" Yes, I love my mother very much " you answer with a smile on your face .

" ...and do you want to kiss your Mommy, do you want to see your Mommy naked and touch her in all the places that your not suppose to … do you want to Lick your Mommys small tits and Lick her big bubble butt … Do you want to make your Mommy cum hard calling your name ??? "

Very embarrassed at all these sexual questions about your Mother, You look up to her still holding the picture of your Mother and simply said " Yes" while looking down at yourself and your big bulge that has now appeared.
11111111.title: A photo of your mother.

choices: She's mean to your mother (WARNING: Extreme path)
She's indifferent to your mother (Mild path)
111111111.content:
Again, you felt a searing pain in your head, as Jasmine stepped on it on her way out of your room.
But, you didn't dwell on that.
You immediately grabbed your phone and dialed your home number, and after a short wait that felt like forever for you, your mother's feeble voice was heard on the other side of the call:
" H-hello?
- Yes mom! It's me!
- Oh sweety, how are you?
..."
You continued by telling her you found this amazing job opportunity, and that the "nice lady" invited her to come live with them, and that she was gonna pay for her surgery. Of course you didn't wanna tell her of the bad things that happened to you, as you didn't want to worry her.
She seemed excited, but as expected, very tired. Yet, she agreed to come by first thing in the morning.
This short phone call made you forget about everything that happened until now, and you felt grateful for Jasmine, for being kind to you and understanding your situation.

You went to take a shower and get changed, as you didn't want your mom to see the foot prints on your chest and face, and went to bed, trying to ignore the flattened pillow and the dirt on it, and just think of the good times ahead.
The next day, your mother arrives at the gate, her IV bag and hanger in tow, and a humble suitcase to fit her few clothes.
You ran down to greet her, and hugged her tightly.
You helped her get in the house, and let her sit on the couch in the living room, while you put her suitcase in your room.
All the while, Jasmine was still sleeping.

Jasmine wakes up...
111111111.title: " Go call your mom"

1111111111.content:
Jasmine comes downstairs, still not having showered from her workout the day before.
You instantly stop your chatter with your mom, and stand up, quickly preparing to introduce Jasmine to your mom.
Jasmine doesn't care, she pushed you aside with one arm, making you fall down.
She's also still in only her bra and panties, and she smells quite a bit.
Your mother finds it a bit hard to stand up, but she does so eventually.
She weekly reaches out her hand to shake Jasmine's, and Jasmine just ignores her.
Instead, she puts her hand up, as if to suggest to your mom that she should kiss it.
Your mother, not wanting to embarrass you, or show her very generous host that she was ungrateful, does so.
You were choked up at this point, but you didn't want to be the reason your mom didn't get her surgery, so you swallowed your pride, and faked a smile.

Your mother sat back down, and Jasmine sat on the far side of the couch, and forcefully drops her feet in your mother's lap.
Your mom, being very weak, yelps in pain, but quickly tries to catch it and replace it with a smile.

" Kiss my feet", Jasmine says coldly.
" Miss Jasmine, please! I'll kiss them, but spare my mom!
- If you're so eager to, I won't deny you the pleasure, hehe!"
You knelt down, and kissed the huge feet still crushing your mother's weak legs.
" Now your turn bitch."
This sent a chill down your spine. You kissed her feet for free, in front of your mother, who spent her whole life working so that you can have a dignified life, and now she's demanding the same from her!
Your mom, now understanding that this woman is evil, submissively bends her head down, and kisses the big smelly feet.

Jasmine wasn't done. She got up, picked you up, and put you with your torso on the couch, and your legs hanging off it, then she sat back down, smothering your vision and breathing.

" I don't want you getting any smart ideas", she said.
She then put her foot on your mother's face, the other one behind it, and started playing with her head like a ball, twisting and turning, putting pressure on it, and wiping her feet on her face, and crushing her neck "playfully".
Your mom tried to keep her composure during this ordeal, but she couldn't help but let out a few squeals of pain, and tearing up a bit.

You were now unconscious from the lack of air, and Jasmine felt that, as your last flails died down.
So she got off, and your mother started crying.
But that didn't last long as Jasmine ripped out the IV needle from her arm, threw the bag on the ground and stomped it, making it explode.
Next, she pushed your mother on the couch, so that her head is almost touching yours, jumped up, and landed with each of her buttcheeks on one of your heads. You didn't feel it as you were already knocked out, but your mother, especially in this weakened state, was in great pain.
That didn't stop Jasmine, as she put her between her humongous thighs, and started squeezing, crushing her chest, and cracking her ribs.
She then let go of your mother's body, and it slid down like a rag-doll.
Big mistake.
Jasmine then took to marching and stomping down on every inch of your mother's body, her legs, her stomach all the way to her chest and arms. A LOT of cracks were heard, as your mother's bones were getting pulverized under the feet of this evil woman.
1111111111.title: She's mean to your mother (WARNING: Extreme...

choices: Jasmine hosts a party at her place.
11111111111.content:
Jasmine grabbed your mother by her head, and stood her up against the wall.
Your mom immediately slid down, as she was too weak to stand up.
Jasmine put her big foot to her neck, and dragged up the wall. Then she retracted her leg and immediately slammed it back on your mother's face, flattening her nose, and causing a torrent of blood to come pouring out.
She she let your mother's body slide down to the ground.
She used her foot to turn her around, so that she was face up, and stomped down on her neck.
Jasmine's big heavy foot was almost flat on the ground.
She then took her foot off your mother's neck, and rested it on the side of her head, then she stomped down.
And again
And again...
Until your mother's skull couldn't take it anymore.

You were just waking up, and you saw Jasmine stomping down on your mother's head.
She was vicious, and with each stomp, you heard the bad cracks of your mother's head slamming against the floor.

Then after some more stomps, Jasmine jumped up high with both feet, and landed heavily on your mom's head, and squish!
It was pulverized.
Jasmine's feet were now flat on the ground, with what was your mother's head now crushed and mangled.

" Pathetic insect", Jasmine said evilly.

You started crying, not knowing what to do, or how to compute this scene, until Jasmine called you over to clean up the mess.

You instinctively went, as you didn't fully realize and assimilate that your mother has just been killed by this evil woman's big feet.
You grabbed a mop and cleaned the puddle, as jasmine grabbed your mother's body with her flat head, and took it somewhere you didn't know.

When you finished, you heard Jasmine calling you over.
You went to her, and what you saw shocked you.

She had just finished shitting, and she was using your mom's flat head to wipe her ass with it, all the while laughing her ass off (bruh)
Once she was done, she threw your mom's body on the ground, and marched on it in place, to further flatten it.

Then she put it in the bathtub, took off your mom's clothes, poured some soap on it, and rinsed it.
When she pulled out your mother's body, it was a heartbreaking sight to see:
Her body was pressed flat, big footprints very visible on her, especially her face, where it was contorted to the shape of Jasmine's feet.

You understood from this scene is that if you try to leave, she will do the same to you, and you didn't want to end your whole bloodline under the feet of this evil bitch, so you talked yourself into staying, and seeing this through, until you could provide evidence, and have enough money to take Jasmine to court. So you just had to bide your time, burdened by your mother's death.

Over the course of the day, Jasmine used your mom as a cushion, where she always kept grinding and farting on her.
She used her to wipe her sandals after returning from shopping.
She used her as a sweat towel after working out, and wiped her armpits and barefeet with her, always choosing to focus on using your mother's flattened face for this.
You mom had become extremely malleable after this treatment.
11111111111.title: Jasmine OFFs your mom.(WARNING: Extreme)

12.content:
You were kinda taken aback. This woman was so used to being dominant, that she didn't care that it was young college man that she just met, just just wanted her feet rubbed, and she demanded it.
But you weren't gonna say no to your boss at the first thing she asks of you.

"Yes, right away Miss Jasmine", you said as you circled the couch and stood next to her feet, awkwardly sitting down on the ground next to them.
